# IntelliJ IDEA files
.idea/
*.iml
out/

# Gradle files
.gradle/
/build/
/app/build/

# Android Studio captures
captures/

# Local configuration files
local.properties

# Log files
*.log
*.tmp

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Key stores and secrets
*.jks
*.keystore

# Kotlin caches
.kotlin/

# Test results
test-results/

# Android generated files
*.apk
*.ap_
*.dex
*.class
*.jar
*.keystore
*.keystore.*
*.lock
*.orig
*.rej

# NDK build files
obj/

# Others
*.iml
.externalNativeBuild
.cxx/

# Temporary files from editors
*.swp
*.swo
